str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To indicate, intimate, suggest, show, prove. From hupo and deiknuo; to exhibit under the eyes, i.e. to exemplify.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From a derivative of kopos; to feel fatigue; by implication, to work hard.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From anti and the middle voice of lambano; to take hold of in turn, i.e. Succor; also to participate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To be weak (physically: then morally), To be sick. From asthenes; to be feeble.
From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
More, rather. Neuter of the comparative of the same as malista; more) or rather.
Happy, blessed, to be envied. A prolonged form of the poetical makar; supremely blest; by extension, fortunate, well off.
To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
(a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
